cause.description:
Though NFL Europe may not be exciting, or have any good players, or even be on tv, it must be saved. How else will 3rd string players get playing time? An actual developmental league would be good, but until that is established NFL Europe is the next best solution.
Plus, there is no other football on tv other than Arena Football, and that is a completely different sport
1. NFL Europe must survive
cause.name: Save NFL Europa
